root: ^Oh, sweetheart, if only I could cry with you. But this ghost form won’t let me. I wish I could give you a big hug.
^I wAnT a HuG. I MIsS YoUUUUUUUU
^It will be ok. I will always be by your side, don’t forget that. Since you can still see me, that’s good right! Even though I look different, my love for you remains unchanged.
^It's not the same. I miss your warmth, your smell..
^Wearing my jacket, you'll carry a part of me everywhere. That's comforting, isn't it?
^Ok Mom, I’m ready. Let's stick together, okay?
